lobby.difficultyInfo: Difficulty affects the total number of element cards that can be borrowed from the market throughout the game, not just in a single turn.
lobby.seedInfo: The seed ensures a consistent game deck shuffle. Using the same seed will result in the same deck order each time.

policies.fundingIncrease:
You drew a funding card that can
contribute towards the implementation of a measure!

funding.name: Funding
funding.description: This card must be paired with a measure card to allow the measure card to be implemented.

hazardousSubstanceRegulation.name: Hazardous substance regulation
hazardousSubstanceRegulation.description: You can pair a producer and an animal sharing the same habitat symbol to secure a habitat-tile

wasteWaterTreatmentFailure.name: Waste water treatment failure
wasteWaterTreatmentFailure.description: Every player with at least one nutrient card in their hand takes a human activity card and places it in their hand.

warmSummer.name: Warm summer
warmSummer.description: If min. one measure has been implemented when this card is lifted, all players can activate all action-tokens. If no measures have been implemented all players need to deactivate all action-token.

climateChange.name: Climate change
climateChange.description: Each time a player gets an impact-tile an additional impact-tile is added to the impact tile puzzle.
climateChange.stageEventText: Because of climate change you get an additional extinction tile!

oilSpill.name: Oil spill
oilSpill.description: Discard all birds open on the table (in players hands and in the market). Cards in hands are not replaced.

hazardousIndustrialSubstances.name: Hazardous substances from industry
hazardousIndustrialSubstances.description: Discard all producer cards on the table (in each players hands and in the market). Cards in hands are not replaced.

overfishing.name: Overfishing
overfishing.description: Discard all fish open on the table (in players hands and in the market). Cards in hands are not replaced.

hunting.name: Hunting
hunting.description: Permanently remove all mammals and birds in your hand from the game.

atmosphericDeposition.name: Atmospheric deposition of hazardous substances
atmosphericDeposition.description: Remove Calanoida from the game, irrespective of where it is.

habitatRestoration.name: Habitat restoration
habitatRestoration.description: You can remove one impact-tile from the impact tile-puzzle

bubbleCurtains.name: Bubble curtains
bubbleCurtains.description: All players can restore all three of their ability tokens.

nutrientUpwelling.name: Nutrient upwelling and internal nutrient cycling
nutrientUpwelling.description: All players take turns (starting from the active player) to add up to two nutrient cards to their hand, or until the market is empty.

excessiveFertilizerUse.name: Excessive fertiliser use
excessiveFertilizerUse.description: Add two nutrient card to the active player's hand. If there are no more nutrient cards in the market, take a human activity card. Place all oxygen cards in all players hands back in the market.

upgradedWasteWaterTreatment.name: Upgraded waste water treatment
upgradedWasteWaterTreatment.description: Take an additional nutrient card from the market or, if you have three nutrient cards in your hand, you can put one back in the market.

improvedNutrientRetention.name: Improved nutrient retention in agriculture
improvedNutrientRetention.description: All producer cards requires one nutrient less for the rest of the game.

migratoryBarrierRemoval.name: Migratory barrier removal
migratoryBarrierRemoval.description: Take one fish or bird card from the market and add it to any players hand.
migratoryBarrierRemoval.targetCommandBarText: Pick a fish or bird card from the market
migratoryBarrierRemoval.destinationCommandBarText: Pick a player's hand to move your chosen card to

fishingGearRegulation.name: Fishing gear regulation
fishingGearRegulation.description: Add all cards in the market which have a mud symbol to any players hand.
fishingGearRegulation.commandBarText: Pick a player's hand to move all the mud species to

recyclingAndWasteDisposal.name: Recycling and waste disposal
recyclingAndWasteDisposal.description: Remove two human activity cards from the hand(s) of any player(s) and replace the cards with cards from the player(s) deck(s).
recyclingAndWasteDisposal.commandBarText: Pick a disaster card to discard from any player's hand

greenEnergy.name: Green energy
greenEnergy.description: If coastal, hard- or soft bottom habitats have already been restored when this card is lifted, add an impact tile. If none of the above habitats have been restored prior to lifting this card, choose one of these habitats to immediately restore.
greenEnergy.commandBarText: Choose either the Rock or Mud habitat to unlock
